Seller's Notes: Summer's here....and this Sebring convertible will let you enjoy it with the top down! This fun-in-the-sun ride is one of the few affordable drop tops with a legitimate backseat. But this convertible does much more than just drop its top to be worth your hard-earned bucks. It delivers all around in classic Chrysler style. This car has excellent paint, seams and uniform gaps, and there are some nice, quality accent pieces that really look classy. You'll love the chrome trim on the front grill, which makes the nose pop in the sun. A walk around the Sebring finds some nicely chromed 16 aluminum wheels, fog lamps and a chrome exhaust tip. All of the exterior styling cues project a classy image. In owner reviews, ride quality is among the Sebring's strong points, as it proves both comfortable and composed at freeway speeds. The interior is well-appointed, dressed in high quality materials and intelligently laid out. The best feature is the instrument cluster, which is tucked neatly in front of the driver and echoes the deco theme of the Chrysler logo. It's clean and clear. Front seat occupants ride in roomy comfort, and rear seating can accommodate two passengers. The entire cabin design is ergonomically sound. Now then, let's put the top down! Two latches, one at each corner of the windshield, release the roof. A toggle switch in the center console sends the top up and back in quick fashion, its quiet motor doing the job without fuss. You could easily get the top down at a traffic light, evoking jealous stares. Please call 877-885-7839 for more information or to schedule a test drive.

Seller's Notes: You are viewing a super nice and extra clean, 2002 CHRYSLER SEBRING TOURING CONVERTIBLE with automatic transmission. This car has only 73K actual miles! This is powered with the V6 cylinder engine. This vehicle drives very good, and its extremely reliable! The car is fun to drive, and it gets an amazing 30MPG on the highway! This is top of the line Sebring and it is absolutely loaded. The convertible top is power and opens with a push of a button, the interior is leather and the car has all options for the year! The engine sounds super, no ticking, knocking or anything else, it shows perfect compression, the transmission shift flawless on all gears, no slipping, no surprises. CHRYSLER has proven thru the years to make very reliable and long lasting vehicles. The car was recently checked out and test driven by our mechanic and no problems were found, we check out all vehicles before we sell them! We sell only sound cars with good history - bid with confidence! The vehicle provides very secure and comfortable ride! The body is very straight. The paint on this vehicle is in good condition except for some small dings and scratches here and there all very minor and very normal for a used vehicle. The interior is very clean. The exterior and interior are both in amazing shape! The car has am/fm radio and CD-Player deck. The car drives and runs like a new vehicle! Sound system sounds good. The interior is in very good shape, no rips or tears on the upholstery. Everything points that its been very well taken care of and if these are maintained properly they go over 200,000 miles! Seller's Notes: Ever since this internet thing greatly impacted our business a few years ago I have written an ad for every single car we have listed on-line. Considering the fact we sell 70 or 80 cars per month this has become a bit of a tiresome task but I know that you want to know where our cars come from and what we do to make sure you are getting the best car for your money so I keep going. I have realized recently that I truly could write a single ad for every car we sell and it would cover the information you need to know why you should buy your car from Johns, so here goes. I spend my days finding and buying the nicest local trades on the market. I dont buy from big national auctions and our cars havent been passed through seven different states. I buy from local new car dealers who have done business with us for years. We then take those local cars and send them through the same independent shop that has done all of our service work for over 23 years for a complete mechanical inspection. If the car needs $1,500 worth of maintenance it gets it and it is done by four of the most experienced and talented mechanics you will ever meet. My brother then spends his days helping our customers get the financing they need to buy a great car while at the same time explaining that while we give you an incredible warranty with your vehicle we have long term protection available that can save you money and stress. We have built relationships with the best lenders we can find and he will work to get you the best rate or the credit help you need. My Dad, John, then spends his days making sure that every customer who leaves our dealership is happy. If something does go wrong he handles the matter personally and you will not find a more fair and decent man to help you. Thats what we do: every car, every customer, every time. They are all Great Cars. Family owned & operated w/over 20 years experience.Conveniently located on Lancaster Ave. in Reading,PA.Handicapped Accessible w/ a comfortable waiting area. Call 888-485-9679 for more information / to schedule YOUR test drive.

This is powered with the V6 cylinder engine. This vehicle drives very good, and its extremely reliable! The car is fun to drive, and it gets an amazing 30MPG on the highway! This is top of the line Sebring and it is absolutely loaded. The convertible top is power and opens with a push of a button, the interior is leather and the car has all options for the year! The engine sounds super, no ticking, knocking or anything else, it shows perfect compression, the transmission shift flawless on all gears, no slipping, no surprises. CHRYSLER has proven thru the years to make very reliable and long lasting vehicles. The car was recently checked out and test driven by our mechanic and no problems were found, we check out all vehicles before we sell them! We sell only sound cars with good history - bid with confidence! The vehicle provides very secure and comfortable ride! The body is very straight. The paint on this vehicle is in good condition except for some small dings and scratches here and there all very minor and very normal for a used vehicle. The interior is very clean. The exterior and interior are both in amazing shape! The car has am/fm radio and CD-Player deck. The car drives and runs like a new vehicle! Sound system sounds good. The interior is in very good shape, no rips or tears on the upholstery. Everything points that its been very well taken care of and if these are maintained properly they go over 200,000 miles! All original CHRYSLER books and manuals are included in the original pouch as shown in the pictures. The spare is in the trunk together with the jack and both appear unused. This is very nice car, don't miss this opportunity to own it at a great price! MENTION CARS.COM GET $300 off purchase

Seller's Notes: You are viewing a super nice and extra clean, 2002 CHRYSLER SEBRING LXI CONVERTIBLE with automatic transmission. This car has only 104K actual miles! This is powered with the V6 cylinder engine. This vehicle drives very good, and its extremely reliable! The car is fun to drive, and it gets an amazing 30MPG on the highway! This is top of the line Sebring and it is absolutely loaded. The convertible top is power and opens with a push of a button, the interior is leather and the car has all options for the year! The engine sounds super, no ticking, knocking or anything else, it shows perfect compression, the transmission shift flawless on all gears, no slipping, no surprises. CHRYSLER has proven thru the years to make very reliable and long lasting vehicles. The car was recently checked out and test driven by our mechanic and no problems were found, we check out all vehicles before we sell them! We sell only sound cars with good history - bid with confidence! The vehicle provides very secure and comfortable ride! The body is very straight. The paint on this vehicle is in good condition except for some small dings and scratches here and there all very minor and very normal for a used vehicle. The interior is very clean. The exterior and interior are both in amazing shape! The car has am/fm radio and CD-Player deck. The car drives and runs like a new vehicle! Sound system sounds good. The interior is in very good shape, no rips or tears on the upholstery. Everything points that its been very well taken care of and if these are maintained properly they go over 200,000 miles! All original CHRYSLER books and manuals are included in the original pouch as shown in the pictures. The spare is in the trunk together with the jack and both appear unused. This is very nice car, don't miss this opportunity to own it at a great price! MENTION CARS.COM GET $300 off purchase

Seller's Notes: Absolutely beautiful and super clean Sebring JXi Convertible finished in Candy Apple Red over Tan Leather and Tan cloth convertible top. This car has just 88K original miles and is the top-of-the-line JXi model and loaded with all the right options and features including: Leather interior, Power cloth convertible top in great shape, 16" alloy wheels, In-dash 6-CD changer, Fog lights, Power seat, Remote locks, and more. This car is in super clean condition throughout with no paint or interior issues and comes complete with the convertible top boot. Most definitely one of if not the cleanest, lowest mileage example for sale anywhere and fitted with the beloved 2.5L V6 engine, not the problematic 2.7L found in later models. Please visit us at our website, www.autolivery.com, for a COMPLETE description of this vehicle, including more pictures, vehicle and warranty info. A link to our website can be found in the "About the Dealer" section found in this ad.

Seller's Notes: Clean Carfax! All major service just performed. New Water Pump and front brakes it is ready for new owner. Just sit and drive. This car should bring you many years of enjoyment with the top up or down. One of best convertibles to own and surely the most popular among budget minded folks looking for value! We own and operate our German Service and Repair shop so we are able to offer cars like this at affordable prices and give you peace of mind that you are buying a mechanically sound car. Warranties are also available. Great Gas Mileage: 28-29 Highway, 25-26 City; Fun to Drive; Comfortably seats; Reasonable truck space even with top down; With the top up, a quite ride for a convertible; Excellent balance of good handling and a smooth ride. A V6 engine comes standard on Touring, Limited, and GTC models. V6 is smoother and generates more thrust. It delivers crisp acceleration performance from a standstill and responds quickly for passing maneuvers at freeway speeds. The 2.7-liter V6 used in the convertible uses an aluminum block fitted with dual overhead cams and four valves per cylinder. It delivers 200 horsepower at 5800 rpm and 190 pounds-feet of torque at 4850 rpm.

Also has factory wheels and great tires. The gray leather interior is spotless with no cracks or rips. Many great features such as POWER WINDOWS, MIRRORS, SEATS AND DOOR LOCKS, ICE COLD A/C, CD PLAYER, AM/FM RADIO, CRUISE CONTROL, POWER TOP. Overall a great looking vehicle that's great on gas. Very affordable, ask about our financing options. We will also include a 3 month or 3000 mile warranty at no additional charge. * At VA QUALITY MOTORS we STRIVE for EXCELLENT customer service. Since this is one of those motors that has to have the timing belt changed at 100K miles, we went ahead and installed a new belt, water pump, tensioner, etc. in the replacement motor. IN OTHER WORDS, this car has had all of the maintenance it will need for a LONG, LONG time. Very attractive dark blue exterior, with light charcoal cloth inside which is in very good condition. As with all our Certified vehicles, this has been subjected to our extensive 120-144 point inspection process. Selling Points: Really good looking car with very low mileage. Incredibly clean. Wood effect dash trim with cruise control and power seats. Outside temperature and compass display. This car has been well maintained, has been serviced every 3,000 miles and has low mileage. Premium wheels enhance its aleady sporty look and with its V6 engine it has plenty of power and pick up. There is lots of storage in the center console and the trunk is very spacious. Kelly Blue Book Value is $4,400. I recently moved to California from Texas and purchased a new car that gets better MPG. I love this car. I inherited this car from my mother when she passed and I hate to sell it, but I cant afford two cars. 

Condition: Excellent interior condition. Exterior condition very good with only a couple of required touchup areas and a couple of very tiny dings. This car has been involved in a couple of minor fender benders requiring only body work and has suffered no other damage. Transmission was rebuilt two years ago. Needs new fuel pump ($300 plus labor). Air conditioner needs minor work. Tires were replaced September 2011. Engine mounts were recently replaced as were headlight lamp covers. Windshield has a crack that is not in need of immediate repair but windshield can be replaced for $200. This is a great car.
